parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the service is deployed.

parameters.name: Container
parameters.description: The name of the container whose process needs to be restarted. This parameter takes effect only if the SoftRestart parameter is set to true.

parameters.name: InstanceList
parameters.description: The instances that you want to restart. Separate multiple instance names with commas (,). For more information about how to query the instance name, see [ListServiceInstances](~~412108~~).

parameters.name: ServiceName
parameters.description: The service name. For more information about how to query the service name, see [ListServices](~~412109~~).

parameters.name: SoftRestart
parameters.description: Specifies whether to restart only the container process without recreating the instance. Default value: false. Valid values: true and false.
